decks.notes: The deck focuses on efficiently disrupting your opponent's game plan while steadily building your board presence with aggressive creatures. By using cards like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to manipulate the battlefield, combined with removal spells like Fatal Push and Solitude, you can control the tempo of the game. Ketramose, the New Dawn and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd provide powerful threats that can quickly end the game if left unchecked. Relic of Progenitus and Thoughtseize help disrupt your opponent's strategies, allowing you to maintain the upper hand throughout the match.

The deck focuses on utilizing creatures with various abilities to create a flexible toolbox of options. By sacrificing creatures and utilizing tools like Viscera Seer and Birthing Ritual, the deck aims to generate value and set up powerful combos. The inclusion of cards like Chord of Calling allows for tutoring specific creatures when needed, while cards like Godless Shrine and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician provide additional utility. The deck aims to control the board while building towards a game-winning combo using its versatile creature toolbox.

The main strategy of this deck revolves around using Underworld Breach in combination with Grinding Station and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to repeatedly mill cards from the library and generate a massive amount of mana. This allows the player to eventually cast Thassa's Oracle or Grapeshot to win the game. The deck also includes some disruption spells like Lightning Bolt and Swan Song to control the board and protect the combo. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and win the game in a single turn.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly get large creatures onto the battlefield by utilizing discard effects like Burning Inquiry and Goblin Lore to fill up the graveyard and cast Hollow One for cheap or for free. The deck also includes aggressive creatures like Marauding Mako and Nethergoyf to apply pressure on the opponent early in the game. By combining this fast creature strategy with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push for removal, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win the game quickly.
